title: Application Version
description: The version of the application following Semantic Versioning (SemVer) 2.0.0 specification

x-specs.given: an app with name and simple SemVer version '1.0.0'
x-specs.then: version badge should be visible with correct version text

x-specs.given: an app with only name (no version property)
x-specs.then: version badge should NOT be rendered
badge should display pre-release version exactly as specified

x-specs.given: an app with build metadata in version '1.0.0+build.123'
x-specs.then: badge should display version with build metadata intact

x-specs.given: an app with both pre-release and build metadata '1.0.0-alpha+001'
x-specs.then: badge should display complete version string

x-specs.given: an app with name and version
x-specs.then: badge should appear before (above) the app name heading
badge should have proper accessibility attributes (data-testid, data-slot)
